info.title: Digital Key Gen2
info.description: Set of APIs for orchestrating various digital key actions between T/L app, CTP services and TSC-DK

tags.name: digital-key-gen2
tags.description: Digital Key APIs consumed by T/L App

tags.name: s2s-gen2
tags.description: Digital Key APIs consumed by other CTP services

tags.name: tsc-notification-gen2
tags.description: APIs related to TSC notification operations

200.description: responseCode - DK-0000, description - Request Processed Successfully

400.description: responseCodes - 400: request header/body is incorrect or missing mandatory attributes/values, CTP-DK-GEN2-1007: GUID used in request is not associated with VIN, CTP-DK-GEN2-1002: No active remote subscription available for the vehicle, CTP-DK-GEN2-1042: TSC-DK Error., CTP-DK-GEN2-1030: Error calling external service

bleRssiValue.description: Cell phone model associated with the key

uwbRssiValue.description: Cell phone manufacturer associated with the key

responseCode.description: Response code indicating the result of the operation

Status.description: Status of the operation, containing messages

model.description: Cell phone model associated with the key

manufacturer.description: Cell phone manufacturer associated with the key

digitalKeyStatus.description: Current status of the digital key

friendlyName.description: A user-friendly name for the device, making it easier to identify.

digitalKeyStatus.description: Current status of the digital key

type.description: Type of ECU operation, typically indicating the action being performed

isCalibrated.description: Indicates whether the key is calibrated

pairingStatus.description: Pairing status of the digital key

sharedKeyCount.description: Number of shared keys. This value depends on the number of records in the database that match keyType as 'shared' and ecuType as 'registration'.

DigitalKeyInfoDetailsResponse.description: Represents details about the digital key, including key ID, key type, registration date, and friendly name.

registeredDate.description: Date registered in the format 'yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss'

friendlyName.description: A user-friendly name for the device, making it easier to identify.

DigitalKeyResponse.description: Response model containing digital keys information and status.

status.description: Status of the request, including response codes and messages

payload.description: Payload containing a list of digital key information details.

DigitalKeyResponsePayload.description: Payload containing a list of digital key information details.

digitalKeyInfoList.description: List of digital key information details

payload.description: The payload containing audit summary details.

status.description: Status of the audit summary request.

AuditSummaryResponseAudit.description: Details of an individual audit summary.

action.description: The action performed during the audit.
action.example: Get Digital Keys for vin JTHBE1D21E5005002

keyId.description: Key identifier associated with the audit.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the audit occurred.

AuditSummaryResponsePayload.description: Payload containing a list of audit summaries.

PairingPasswordResponse.description: Response containing the pairing password, brand information and its status.

status.description: Status object containing information about the response status.

payload.description: Payload object containing the pairing password and brand information.

PairingPasswordResponsePayload.description: Payload containing the pairing password and brand information.

pairingPassword.description: The pairing password for the digital key.

oemId.description: The vehicle OEM ID associated with digital key creation.

brandName.description: The brand name associated with digital key creation.

brandId.description: The brand ID associated with digital key creation.

exteriorNfcLocation.description: Location of the exterior NFC reader

nfcPlacementGraphicsIdentifier.description: The ID that defines the location of NFC reader.

radioTechnologies.description: List of supported radio technologies used by the vehicle.

DeleteDigitalKeyResponse.description: Response model for deleting a digital key

status.description: Status information, including messages and response code
